#include<iostream>
#include<string.h>
#include<stdlib.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    string s1,s2;
    cin>>s1>>s2;
    while(s1!="0" && s2!="0")
    {

        int l1=s1.length();
        int l2=s2.length();
        //cout<<l1<<" "<<l2<<endl;
        int i=l1-1;
        int j=l2-1;
        int total=0,carry=0;
        while(i>=0 && j>=0)
        {
            if(s1[i]-'0'+s2[j]-'0'+carry>9)
            {
                total++;
                //cout<<s1[i]<<" "<<s2[j]<<" "<<carry<<endl;
                carry = (s1[i]-'0'+s2[j]-'0'+carry)/10;
            }
            else
                carry=0;
            i--;
            j--;
        }
        if(total==0)
            cout<<"No carry operation."<<endl;
        else if(total==1)
            cout<<"1 carry operation."<<endl;
        else
            cout<<total<<" carry operations."<<endl;
        cin>>s1>>s2;
    }
    return 0;
}
